title: A Guide for Datadog Users Building with LLMs
title1: A Guide for Datadog Users Building with LLMs - Helicone
title2: A Guide for Datadog Users Building with LLMs - Helicone
description: Discover why LLM developers are exploring alternatives to Datadog for observability. Learn about Helicone's easy integration, prompt templates, custom properties, and edge caching features that make it the preferred choice for LLM monitoring and optimization.
author: Lina Lam
